@title KIP-7 Fungible Token Standard
  Note: the KIP-13 identifier for this interface is 0x65787371.
nodes.name: IKIP7
Transfer

nodes.documentation:
@dev Emitted when the allowance of a `spender` for an `owner` is set by
 a call to {approve}. `value` is the new allowance.
nodes.name: Approval

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns the amount of tokens in existence.
 @return the total supply of this token.
nodes.name: totalSupply
balanceOf
transfer
allowance
approve
transferFrom

attributes.documentation:
@title KIP-7 Fungible Token Standard
  Note: the KIP-13 identifier for this interface is 0x65787371.
attributes.name: IKIP7
Transfer

attributes.documentation:
@dev Emitted when the allowance of a `spender` for an `owner` is set by
 a call to {approve}. `value` is the new allowance.
attributes.name: Approval

attributes.documentation:
@notice Returns the amount of tokens in existence.
 @return the total supply of this token.
attributes.name: totalSupply
balanceOf
transfer
allowance
approve
transferFrom

allowance(address,address).details: Throws if the contract is pausable and paused.	     /// This value changes when {approve} or {transferFrom} are called.

params.owner: The account allowed `spender` to withdraw the tokens from the account.
params.spender: The address is approved to withdraw the tokens.

allowance(address,address).return: An amount of spender's token approved by owner.

approve(address,uint256).details: Throws if the contract is pausable and paused.     /// IMPORTANT: Beware that changing an allowance with this method brings the risk that someone may use both the old and the new allowance by unfortunate transaction ordering. One possible solution to mitigate this race condition is to first reduce the spender's allowance to 0 and set the desired value afterwards: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729     /// Emits an {Approval} event.

params.amount: The token amount will be approved.
params.spender: The address is approved to withdraw the tokens.

approve(address,uint256).return: a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.

params.account: An address for whom to query the balance

balanceOf(address).return: the amount of tokens owned by `account.

totalSupply().return: the total supply of this token.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Throws if the message caller's balance does not have enough tokens to spend. Throws if the contract is pausable and paused.	     /// Emits a {Transfer} event.

params.amount: The token amount will be transferred.
params.recipient: The owner will receive the tokens.

transfer(address,uint256).return: A boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Throw unless the `sender` account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism. Throw if `sender` or `recipient` is the zero address. Throws if the contract is pausable and paused.	     /// Emits a {Transfer} event. Emits an `Approval` event indicating the updated allowance.

params.amount: The token amount will be transferred.
params.recipient: The owner will receive the tokens.
params.sender: The current owner of the tokens.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: A boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.

devdoc.title: KIP-7 Fungible Token Standard  Note: the KIP-13 identifier for this interface is 0x65787371.

allowance(address,address).notice: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `spender` will be allowed to spend on behalf of `owner` through {transferFrom}. This is zero by default.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Sets `amount` as the allowance of `spender` over the caller's tokens.

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.

totalSupply().notice: Returns the amount of tokens in existence.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Moves `amount` tokens from the caller's account to `recipient`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Moves `amount` tokens from `sender` to `recipient` using the allowance mechanism. `amount` is then deducted from the caller's allowance.
